Description: Painted sycomore fig wood shabti of Duat with a blue striped lappet wig, a carved face, a red and blue collar, crossed arms in relief with the hands holding two red hoes(one is indistinct), the legs are inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book of the Dead in eight rows of incised black hieroglyphs separated by red lines.
Condition: fair - section missing from the front and back
